synopsis.text: This high school drama takes an unexpected turn when average student, Haruka Shinozaki, finds the courage to confess his feelings to the seemingly perfect class representative, Akiho Kousaka. To his astonishment, Kousaka accepts his confession, but Shinozaki soon discovers that his new girlfriend's meticulous and studious approach to dating is far from ordinary. Kousaka, inexperienced in relationships, strives to please Shinozaki by exploring intimate topics and suggesting activities that leave him both surprised and uncomfortable. As the pair navigate their unconventional romance, Shinozaki must find a way to balance Kousaka's earnest efforts with his own desires, making for a uniquely entertaining and enlightening tale.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
